part_1.description_1: While you can safely display your hard skills, directly related to your role, your soft ones may need a boost of recognition.
part_1.description_2: Reveal helps you receive feedback to build trust in all your skills.
part_1.description_3: With the the endorsement of your peers, your skills are better recognised and valuable.

part_2.description_1: Giving spontaneous feedback in the workplace is hard, but neuroscience says a proactive invitation makes it far easier.
part_2.description_2: Whenever you want input from your colleagues, your friends, you peers, just post a feedback request, and feel the value of all you skills.

part_3.description_1: Soft skills are especially relevant in CV writing, interviewing and communicating with people at work or other areas of your life.
part_3.description_2: As you progress through your job search process, use Reveal to update your CV and highlight your most relevant soft skills.
part_3.heading_1: Let people know how skilled you are

answer_sent.heading: Your answers have been sent to {{ user }}

complete_profile.description_1: You can ask endorsements right now for all your skills, even the ones you think are not worth sharing!
complete_profile.description_2: You'd be surprised to find out how people around you use the knowledge they have gained from years of experience in the workplace and in private life.

get_started.description: Complete your profile to have a more personalized experience.
get_started.heading: Let’s get you started

point_1.description: Complete your profile to make yourself known in the community and connect with other skilled people.
point_1.label: Who are you?

point_2.description: Choose your areas of expertise and let us guide through the « tags ».
point_2.label: How skilled are you?

point_3.description: Give endorsements to people you know about their skills and help them to be better recognised.
point_3.label: Who do you want to reveal?
